data.title: How Old Are the Love Island USA Islanders? Here's Everyone's Age Gap
data.meta_description: Learn the Love Island USA Season 6 cast's ages.
data.text:
Season 6 of Love Island USA has ignited with a fiery start! From drama-filled re-couplings to relationships being put to the ultimate test during Casa Amor, this season is serving up drama like never before. With new host Ariana Madix leading the charge, the islanders are living their best lives against the stunning backdrop of Fiji.

If you've been paying attention, you know this season has been one for the books. After the Season 6 Casa Amor, where the audience witnessed even more drama unfold, the Islanders are reliving their best (and worst) moments both in Casa Amor and back in the villa, leaving no stone unturned. With emotions running high and secrets coming to light, the tension and excitement are at an all-time high as we get through tough challenges like movie night.

For More Love Island USA:

Who Won Every Season of Love Island USA?

The Love Island USA Season 5 Finalists Reveal If They’re Still Together

Where Is The Cast From 'Love Island' Season 1 Today?

As tensions run high and the islander are confronted with past mistakes and differing levels of maturity, you may be wondering how old your favorites are as well as the age gap between them and their partner. Lucky for you, we've got you covered with a rundown of all the Love Island USA Season 6 cast's ages:

How Old Is Leah Kateb?

Age: 24

Leah entered the villa swooning over Rob, but now her heart lies with Miguel. Obsessed with David Lynch films, Leah comes from a family that has a movie theater in their house. She also happens to have three dogs, three horses, and pigs, making her life as lively as the villa drama.

How Old Is Caine Bacon?

Age: 28

Cain came into the villa from Casa Amor initially pairing up with Liv before pivoting over to Sierra. Now he's firmly in the main villa and looking to make his mark and find love.

How Old Is Miguel Harichi?

Age: 27

Hailing all the way from the United Kingdom, this fitness model and entrepreneur is captivated by Leah's charm. Despite forming a connection with another girl at Casa Amor, he's now ready to explore where his heart truly lies in the villa.

How Old Is Kaylor Martin?

Age: 22

Kaylor was coupled up with Aaron until Casa Amor shook things up, putting their relationship to the test. Her celebrity crushes include Harry Jowsey, Patrick Swayze, and Jacob Elordi.

How Old Is Rob Rausch?

Age: 25

This southern gentleman has a passion for snakes and a knack for cracking jokes in the villa, in his infamous overalls. His journey to find love began with Leah, then Andrea, and now he's returned from Casa Amor hand in hand with Daniela.

How Old Is Serena Page?

Age: 24

Born and raised in Houston, Texas, Serena is a true southern belle who can ride a horse with ease. Coupled up with Kordell until Casa Amor brought new challenges, she's not afraid to speak her mind and stand her ground. Fluent in ASL, Serena learned the language at the age of 5 for her church.

How Old Is Connor Newsum?

Age: 28

The fitness mogul hails from Santa Monica, California. Despite his efforts to win over Leah's heart, Connor left the villa without a love connection. Outside of Love Island, he's a certified scuba instructor and passionate fly-fishing hobbyist.

How Old Is JaNa Craig?

Age: 27

Although she is the oldest in the villa, JaNa is bringing all the youthful energy to the show. Hailing from Kailua, Hawaii, and Okinawa, Japan, she can speak a little Japanese and Spanish, adding a multicultural flair to her personality. JaNa's bedtime routine includes cuddling with her two body pillows, Ben and Jerry. As she navigates the villa's dynamics, she's got her eyes set on Kenny.

How Old Is Kendall Washington?

Age: 27

From San Diego, California, this charmer made a memorable return to the villa after Casa Amor, still smitten with Nicky. Known for his affable personality, he's carving out a path of luck in love within the villa. Beyond romantic pursuits, he's established himself as the supportive friend within the group, offering counsel and camaraderie amidst the highs and lows of Love Island USA.

How Old Is Olivia “Liv” Walker?

Age: 21

She may be young, but Liv is bringing the heat all the way from Sydney, Australia. Currently coupled up with Caine, this bombshell is determined to find love and isn't letting anything stand in her way. With a fiery spirit and a taste for adventure, she's ready to make waves in the villa and seize every opportunity for romance.

How Old Is Aaron Evans?

Age: 26

From Marbella, Spain, this guy made his mark on Love Island after winning Traitors UK in Season 1. A self-proclaimed Harry Potter nerd, he brings both charm and intellect to the villa. Now, he's focused on winning back Kaylor's heart after his Casa Amor escapade.

How Old Is Kenny Rodriguez?

Age: 24

This fitness influencer traveled from Dallas, Texas to the villa in search of love, and he’s discovered a deep connection with JaNa. Despite initial challenges and temptations in Casa Amor, he's now committed to exploring a meaningful relationship with JaNa.

How Old Is Sierra Mills?

Age: 22

This administrative assistant returned to the villa coupled up with Miguel, but she’s now embarking on a new journey to find love within its walls. The Los Angeles native made a striking entrance from Casa Amor, ready to explore new connections.

How Old Is Catherine Marshall?

Age: 24

From Fountain Hills, Arizona, she entered the villa post-Casa Amor, initially hand in hand with Kenny. However, after Kenny broke things off and declared his feelings for JaNa, her quest for love takes on a new direction.

How Old Is Daia McGhee?

Age:27

This photographer is good at capturing picture-perfect moments, but her journey with Kordell took a turn after he brought her back to the villa post-Casa Amor. Splitting her time between Los Angeles, California, and Sydney, Australia, this traveler brings a worldly perspective to the villa. Now navigating the complexities of romance, she's ready to explore new connections in the villa.

How Old Is Daniela Ortiz Rivera?

Age: 22

This college student from Longwood, Florida, initially found love in Casa Amor with Aaron, but returned to the villa hand in hand with Rob. Known for her confidence and determination, she's ready to shake things up with other Islanders and isn't afraid to assert herself.

How Old Is Emeka “Nigel” Okafor?

Age: 28

Originally from Ann Arbor, Michigan, but now living in Houston, Texas, this real estate investor made a memorable exit from the villa. His claim to fame is visiting a remote village in China, showcasing his adventurous side.

How Old Is Hannah Smith?

Age: 26

At 26 years old, Hannah is a seasoned world traveler, but she despises turbulence more than anything else. Her time in the villa was cut short, but she hopes to rekindle love with one of her celebrity crushes, Odell Beckham Jr. and Michael B. Jordan.

How Old Is Nicole Jacky?

Age: 26

This California bombshell entered the villa in search of love and has found it with Kendall. As a medical sales representative, she's not just bringing her charm but also using her intelligence to support the other girls in the villa.

How Old Is Hakeem White?

Age: 29

This charismatic bombshell hails from Kingston, Jamaica. He's an online fitness and business coach and has a background as a mascot for his high school and college teams.

How Old Is Cassidy Laudano?

Age: 27

This bombshell entered the villa as head of PR at a tech startup, hoping to find love with Rob. Unfortunately, her time in the villa fell short when she couldn't find a lasting connection. An avid animal lover, she's been a vegetarian her entire life.

How Old Is Coye Simmons?

Age: 28

He's a School District Unit Director from Winston-Salem, North Carolina, standing tall at 6'8". Leaving the villa with his sights set on new heights of love, he brought a commanding presence to Love Island. With a background in basketball, he not only played on a collegiate team but also went on to play professionally in Germany.

How Old Is Kordell Beckham?

Age: 22

At first glance, this Texan may appear older, but he's only 22 years old. He entered the villa with hopes of finding love and initially found it with Serena, although their relationship hit a bump in Casa Amor. Interestingly, his brother is the famous NFL wide receiver Odell Beckham Jr.

How Old Is Andrea Carmona?

Age: 25

This bombshell made a dramatic entrance into the villa, stirring up Leah and Rob's relationship all the way from Florida. Unfortunately, she didn't survive an islander-led vote, but she's hopeful about pursuing her dream of becoming a singer.
